command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user cYPAHDVF1MZtM6S.caf383761fdf --database Rc5qDPWJcsCQwb6WK47Ybr --execute SHOW CREATE TABLE content_templates;
stdout:
Table	Create Table
content_templates	CREATE TABLE `content_templates` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `name` varchar(256) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `nameFr` varchar(256) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `description` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `templateType` enum('lesson','quiz','evaluation','article','podcast_script') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'lesson',
  `structure` json DEFAULT NULL,
  `isDefault` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `usageCount` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci
